Query.Sentence: WITH total_times AS( SELECT t_id, sum(tm_end_time - tm_start_time) AS total_task_time, sum(tm_end_time - tm_start_time) AS total_task_time_decimal FROM timers GROUP BY t_id ), user_times AS( SELECT t_id, user_, sum(tm_end_time - tm_start_time) AS user_task_time FROM timers GROUP BY t_id, user_ ), task_project AS( SELECT t_id , t_name , (t_name) AS t_name_title , t_description , t_date , t_finished , p_id FROM tasks GROUP BY t_id, p_id ) SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM projects p INNER JOIN users_projects up ON up.p_id = p.p_id INNER JOIN task_project tp ON tp.p_id = p.p_id INNER JOIN total_times tt ON tt.t_id = tp.t_id INNER JOIN user_times ut ON ut.t_id = tp.t_id AND ut.user_ = up.user_ #WHERE# ORDER BY t_date ASC

WITH tabla AS( SELECT p.*,t.*,up.user_ FROM tasks t INNER JOIN projects p ON t.P_ID = p.P_ID INNER JOIN users_projects up on up.p_id = t.p_id WHERE t.t_finished = false GROUP BY t.t_id, p_name, p.p_id, up.user_ ) SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM tabla #WHERE# ORDER BY t_date desc
